head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths LAY, DR. NANCY DUKE S.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths LAY, DR. NANCY DUKE S.

block.p: LAY-Dr. Nancy Duke S. On September 24th, 2000 at age 62. Beloved sister of Manuel, Manchiu, Manhoo, Addellia and Eva Lay and Rose Gonzales. Professor Lay was an educator at City College and helped establish the ESL Department. Friends may call at Frank E. Campbell, 1076 Madison Ave. at 81 St,. Thursday 2-5 and 7-9 PM. Funeral Mass at Corpus Christi Church, 529 W. 121 St., Friday, 10 AM. Interment private. Contributions in her memory may be made to the Breast Center of Memorial Sloan-Kettering Cancer Center.
